functions.tag: {tmw:{id:601,type:5004},display:{Name:'{"text":"肉塊の模倣","color":"red","italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"ミミックの研究で生み出された指輪","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"僅かに指に食い込んでくる","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"装備時、ミミックの技が強化","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"・的中時の回復量が2倍","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"・的中時に攻撃力上昇II(0:10)","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"・コンボ終端技のダメージ量が2倍","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"---------- Inventory ----------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  ■□□□□□□□□  指定のスロットに入れると","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  効果が発動するタイプの","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  装飾品です","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"------------------------------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"姿勢を正して両手を合わせ、","color":"dark_gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"あなたが信じている神に祈ってください。","color":"dark_gray","italic":false}]']}}
